List of species common to the galaxy

Chozo - Large, flightless bird people

Aandrisk - Lizard people with a colourful feathered plumage down their head and back

Human - Normies

Zoltan - Energy people

Utun - Small round black-furred monkey people

Quelin - Large, imposing lobster centaur people

Gessurans - Dinosaur people

Qwik - Fungal hive-minds

Cudoxet - Land-squids

Lura - Bipedal bat people
